ygData.subject: Re: Animal, Troll, Gnome, Barbarian sketches?
ygData.msgSnippet: nope...pottery makes cookies, completely different from cookie cutters...looks sorta like fishcakes or something. It s annoying too, since i am in halas and
ygData.messageBody:
nope...pottery makes cookies, completely different from cookie
cutters...looks sorta like fishcakes or something.
It's annoying too, since i am in halas and want some cookie cutters to try
baking cookies :) guess i need to head to highpass for ore.

Xillitil/Povar

>When people say these make cookies or cookie cutters are they
>talking about the same thing? Are these cookie cutters similar to
>the cookie cutters that the blacksmiths make?
>
>Has anyone ever tried to use the blacksmith's cookie cutter or the
>pottery cookie cutter as a component in .... say the deity
>construction?
>
